data.title: South China Morning Post
data.meta_description: Kathryn Giordano joined the Post in 2023 after working as a producer at FOX23 and an editorial assistant at NBC Sports during the 2020 Tokyo Summer Olympics and the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics. She graduated from Boston College in 2021 with a degree in Communication and minors in Journalism and International Studies. She is also a self-published author.
